post:
**Did @Jeffrey Integration in less then 2 hours.**

To start off a new superbly cheap service I am going to be offering (WHMCS Integration) I want to give someone the change to have a free integration done.

First to claim gets it.

What I need from you: CSS, IMAGES, JAVASCRIPT(optional: JS), any menu/navbar items you need, any custom edits you want(and/or a rough sketch of what you want it to look like).

So, basically first person to post here wanting it I'll PM the person, I will do the integration for them.

What I did for @Jeffrey:
![proof_of_concept](http://puu.sh/1CxGL)
![proof_of_concept2](http://puu.sh/1Cyko)
